name: WPRS Shortcodes
author: Hesham Zebida

sections.description:
This add-on allow you to use a shortcode to display Box elements by entry id, which can be used on any post, page, widget or in theme files. This is a cool and light add-on for the WPRichSnippets plugin, which will allow you to establish amazing customization on your WPRichSnippets enabled site.

Useful Resources

  1. Shortcodes add-on page.
  2. Shortcodes add-on documentation.

More Add-ons

Extend the WPRichSnippets plugin functionality with add-ons, view more Add-ons on our website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire wprs-shortcodes folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. DO NOT change the name of the wprs-shortcodes folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. You are all set.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Fixed a front end notice on 404 pages.

1.1

  • Pumped WordPress tested version.

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Display any of the Box markup elements with layout via a simple shortcode. An add-on for WPRichSnippets plugin.
